mapper.update:
update his_handover
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update his_handover set create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, join_date = #{joinDate,jdbcType=DATE}, admission_situation = #{admissionSituation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admission_diagnosis = #{admissionDiagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cuurent_diagnosis = #{cuurentDiagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medi_treatment_process = #{mediTreatmentProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handover_considerations = #{handoverConsiderations,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_modified = #{isModified,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hospital_number = #{hospitalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, succession_user_id = #{successionUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, c.user_name as successionUserName, b.createUserName as createUserName FROM `his-rpac`.his_handover as a LEFT JOIN `his-userinfo`.user_info as c ON c.id = a.succession_user_id LEFT join ( SELECT c.user_name as createUserName, c.id as createUserId FROM `his-rpac`.his_handover as a LEFT JOIN `his-userinfo`.user_info as c ON c.id = a.create_user_id) as b ON b.createUserId = a.create_user_id where 1= 1
and c.user_name like concat('%' #{parameter.successionUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and b.createUserName like concat('%' #{parameter.createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and a.hospital_number like concat('%' #{parameter.hospitalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by ${parameter.orders}
